name: Create and send WooCommerce coupons to your HubSpot CRM contacts
description:
Use this template to automatically create a WooCommerce coupon and send it in a Microsoft 365 Email message when a HubSpot CRM contact meets a certain condition (in this case, when contact was created a year ago).

The scenario is set to run once a day. You can change it by clicking the clock icon on the first module.
